gridType.title: Grid style
gridType.description: The style of the grid showing the list of 'Lists'

showFacebookComments.title: Enable Facebook comments for lists?
showFacebookComments.description: Display Facebook comments box below list results after a user finishes a list

showSharePreview.title: Show share preview
showSharePreview.description: Show share 'preview' with image below a list on the 'view list' page

autoApprove.title: Auto-approve user-created lists
autoApprove.description: If this option is enabled, all new lists created by the users will be automatically approved and published on the site

autoApproveUpdates.title: Auto-approve all updates to already approved lists
autoApproveUpdates.description: If auto-approve is disabled and this option is enabled, all updates(edits) to lists which are already approved will be automatically accep and published on the site. If 'Auto-update'(the above option) is disabled, this option is discarded and updates will always be automatically approved.

fileUploadMaxSize.title: Maximum File upload size (in MB) for user uploads
fileUploadMaxSize.description: Important: Should not be higher than the the 'upload_max_filesize' and 'post_max_size'. If the maximum upload size supported by your server is lower than the value you provide here, this value will have no effect.

youMayAlsoLikeShortCode.title: You may also like Shortcode - The short-code used to display 'You may also like' list. Refer the list of available shortcodes in the documentation.

viewListMode.title: View list page mode - Either to show all items in a single page or each item in a new page.

showAdAfterEvery.title: Number of list items after which an Interstitial ad should be shown(with a skip button). [Used only in 'multi-page' mode]. Choose 0 to disable. Set the AD code in the widgets page.
showAdAfterEvery.description: If you choose 3, a page with ad will be shown after every 3 items of the list. ie, after the 3rd one, 6th one, 9th one and so on.

enableListEditNotification.title: Enable 'List edited' Notification
enableListEditNotification.description: Enable/Disable notifications for a user when a list created by him/her is edited by another user.

listEditNotificationMailSubjectTemplate.title: 'List edited' Notification email 'subject' template
listEditNotificationMailSubjectTemplate.description: The template for notification email SUBJECT.

enableListApprovedNotification.title: Enable 'List approved' Notification
enableListApprovedNotification.description: Enable/Disable notifications for a user when a list created by him/her is approved by admin.

listApprovedNotificationMailSubjectTempl.title: 'List approved' Notification email 'subject' template
listApprovedNotificationMailSubjectTempl.description: The template for 'list approved' notification email SUBJECT.

listApprovedNotificationMailTemplate.title: 'List approved' Notification email template
listApprovedNotificationMailTemplate.description: The template for 'list approved' notification email.

addUserPicAndNameOnListOG.title: Add user's name and profile picture on List preview images on Social Media
addUserPicAndNameOnListOG.description: Enable/disable adding user's name and profile picture on List preview images on Facebook, Twitter, etc(OG image)

listImageTextFont.title: The True Type Font file to be used for writing user's name to list preview image

listImageTextFontSize.title: The Font SIZE to be used for writing user's name to list preview image

listImageTextBgColor.title: The background color for writing user's name to list preview image

listImageTextColor.title: The TEXT color for writing user's name to list preview image
